title: Kudou-sensei no Majestic Days
original_name: 工藤先生のマジェスティックデイズ
sinopse:
Super pervert and good-for-nothing teacher Kudou-sensei meets his match when bad boy student Hinami turns him into a slave. But who's actually enslaved here?

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot: Shinsou

Note: Shinsou was collected in Shuuchaku Love.
